data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 18,557 believers in Taranaki and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Taranaki, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Taranaki, New Zealand so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Taranaki to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Taranaki a passion to plant another simple church.
Father, 0.8% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, fill the 105,000 souls living in the state of Taranaki with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Taranaki, New Zealand, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.section_summary:
the state of Taranaki, New Zealand has a population of 105,000.

We estimate Taranaki has 18,557 people who might know Jesus, 35,042 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 51,401 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 18,557 believers in Taranaki, New Zealand a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
